snippet: 2 Chainz, formerly known as Tity Boi of Playaz Circle, performed his first New York concert at S.O.B.’s on Monday night.
abstract: Jon Caramanica reviews performance by rapper 2 Chainz at SOB's.
lead_paragraph: 2 Chainz, formerly known as Tity Boi of Playaz Circle, performed his first New York concert at S.O.B.’s on Monday night.

headline.seo: 2 Chainz, Formerly of Playaz Circle, on His Own at S.O.B.’s
headline.main: A Rapper Reborn Into a Whole New Status
headline.print_headline: A Rapper Reborn Into a Whole New Status
